description: Marketplace chats with the brains behind the designer-dress rental company.
teaser: Marketplace chats with the brains behind the designer-dress rental company.
contentencoded: Jen Hyman started Rent the Runway right out of business school, and the young entrepreneur says she never dreamed she would be the boss of 250 employees and serve four million customers, let alone run the largest dry-cleaning facility in America.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Jen Hyman started Rent the Runway right out of business school, and the young entrepreneur says she never dreamed she would be the boss of 250 employees and serve four million customers, let alone run the largest dry-cleaning facility in America.

"}]
title: Jen Hyman on Rent the Runway's "dream fulfillment"
